data.eml:eml: Chapelieria magna, a new species of Rubiaceae from eastern Madagascar

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kainulainen, Kent, Razafimandimbison, Sylvain G. (2015): Chapelieria magna, a new species of Rubiaceae from eastern Madagascar. PhytoKeys 44: 89-95, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.44.8513, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.44.8513
